description.en:
Kikuru Madan, a monster hunter with excellent performance because of his particular job in the forest, decides to quit his job because he doesn't want to waste his youth. The reason he wants to quit was that one of his friends got married. One day there is a new recruit. Enome the Guild Receptionist asks him to accompany Hitamuki Kyan the Lolipai Martial Artist to watch her back and teach her how to work. He accepts the request, half because he was worried about her and half because he wanted her to become his successor before he retires completely. Sadly, his plan to retire is derailed by Hitamuki being useless and always attracting some monster. Can Kikuru Madan retire peacefully, despite being saddled with a useless newbie?  
  
Hunting erotic commentary enthusiastically!
description.ja: へっぽこ武道家、つんけん白魔、ものぐさ黒魔、酔いどれ戦士、４人の新米ガード達は街の平和を守るため、魔物に立ち向かうが、ことごとく凌辱を受けることに…
description.es-la: Las cuatro guardias novatas -una artista marcial cabeza hueca, un demonio blanco pellizcado, un demonio negro perezoso y una guerrera borracha- se enfrentan a los demonios para proteger la paz de la ciudad, pero son humilladas a cada paso...

description.en: Shogo Ban is now a chef at Ristorante Legare. As the Yokohama branch of the Trattoria Baccanale he used to work at, he has been entrusted with the responsibility of head of the pasta section. Rejoin Ban as he struggles to meet the expectations of work and develop his personal relationships.

title.en: Shinu hodo Kimi no Shojo ga Hoshii

altTitles.ja: 死ぬほど君の処女が欲しい

altTitles.ja-ro: Shinu Hodo Kimi no Shojo ga Hoshii

altTitles.en: I Would Die to Have Your First Time

altTitles.vi: Tôi Nguyện Được Chết Để Lấy Đi Trinh Tiết Của Em

description.en: Nishimori Tooru (31), an unattractive office worker, is married to the most beautiful woman in the company, Mika-san. From an outsider's point of view, they would be envious of him. However, he has a secret he cannot tell anyone about. The only female he knows is Mika, but Mika had known lots of other men. Because he loves her, he is bothered by this fact. "It's not possible, and it will never come true…" After falling off the train tracks, a miracle occurred. This is a twisted but a youthful and pure love story about he who longs for his wife's virginity.
description.vi:
Một nhân viên văn phòng làm công ăn lương mặc dù đã có mái ấm vợ đẹp, anh vẫn mặc cảm tự ti về bản thân mình và phải sống trong nỗi ám ảnh về khao khát được nhìn thấy những biểu cảm từ con người sâu thẳm trong cô. 
Tưởng chừng như phải chấp nhận sống chung trong sự khác biệt quá lớn về mặt ngoại hình và cảm xúc giữa mình và cô vợ.
Anh được xuyên không làm lại cuộc đời.

altTitles.th: ยุคแห่งความโอหัง

description.ar: سيد بيرباز، الذي قاد الحرب التي استمرت 28 عامًا إلى النصر، "آشا بيرباز". بالنسبة لبيرفاز، الذي دمرته الحرب الطويلة، تتوجه آشا إلى العائلة الإمبراطورية لتلقي مكافأة النصر التي وعد بها الإمبراطور. ومع ذلك، فإن المكافأة الوحيدة التي عادت كانت <الحق في اختيار شريك الزواج>. كخيار أفضل، أشار آشا إلى "دوق كارلايل هافن"، وهو الأمير الأول الذي تم حرمانه مؤخرًا من لقب ولي العهد. إذا تم رفضها، كانت تنوي الحصول على نفقة من الإمبراطور... "ماركيز بيرباز. سأقبل عرض زواجك". وعلى عكس التوقعات، قبل دوق كارلايل اختيار آشا. وعود بدعم هائل لبيرفاز...!
description.en:
The lord of Pervaz, who led the 28-year war to victory, Asha Pervaz. 

For Pervaz, who was devastated by the long war, Asha heads to the imperial family to receive the victory reward promised by the emperor.  However, the only reward that came back was the "right to choose a marriage partner." 

As the best choice, Asha pointed out the Duke of Carlisle Haven, the first prince who had recently been deprived of the title of crown prince.  If she was refused, she intended to receive compensation from the emperor... 

"Marquise Perbaz. I will accept your marriage proposal." 

Contrary to expectations, the Duke of Carlisle accepted Asha's choice.  Promising tremendous support for Pervaz...!

---
After winning a long war, Asha Pervaz is expecting the emperor to compensate her with money. Unlike her expectations though, the emperor asks Asha to choose her own husband from a list of nobles. Asha chooses Duke Carlisle Haven, the emperor’s eldest son and former crown prince. Asha expects him to object and pay an alimony instead, but the duke actually agrees to marry her! He even promises to help Asha rebuild Pervaz. What does the duke really want? And will Asha get what she wants without getting embroiled in the growing royal conspiracy?
description.fr: Après avoir mis fin à la longue guerre contre les Lurs, Asha Pervaz, Seigneure des terres de Pervaz, se rend au palais impérial dans l'espoir d'obtenir la récompense promise par l'Empereur. Mais contrairement à ses attentes, Asha ne se voit offrir que le droit de choisir un époux. Fine stratège, elle choisit le Duc Carlisle Haven, fils aîné de l'empereur et prince héritier temporairement privé de son autorité, pensant que celui-ci refusera et lui versera en échange une compensation financière. Mais contre toute attente, le Duc accepte de l'épouser. Il lui promet de lui fournir les matériaux nécessaires à la reconstruction de Pervaz si Asha l'aide à récupérer le trône qui lui revient de droit.
description.id: Setelah kematian ayah dan kakak-kakaknya melawan suku barbar, Asha Pervaz turun tangan untuk menggantikan mereka. Kemenangan berhasil ia raih, namun imbalan yang ia terima hanya cemoohan rakyat dan “hak memilih calon suami”, alih-alih hadiah uang untuk membangun kembali wilayahnya. Sadar bahwa Kaisar mempermainkannya, Asha memilih Carlisle Haven Evaristo, sang putra mahkota kekaisaran yang dicabut haknya akibat skandal besar, untuk menjadi suaminya! Asha yakin Carlisle akan menolaknya, namun…
description.ko: 28년간의 전쟁을 승리로 이끈 페르바즈의 영주, '아샤 페르바즈'. 긴 전쟁으로 황폐해진 페르바즈를 위해 아샤는 황제가 약속한 승전 보상을 받으러 황실로 향한다.   하지만 돌아온 보상은 고작 <결혼 상대 선택권>.  최선의 선택으로 얼마 전 황태자 위를 박탈당한 1황자, '칼라일 헤이븐 공작'을 지목한 아샤. 거절하면 황제에게 위자료를 지급받을 생각이었으나…  "페르바즈 변경백. 그대의 청혼을 받아들이겠다."  예상과 다르게 칼라일 공작은 아샤의 선택을 받아들였다. 페르바즈에 대한 엄청난 지원까지 약속하면서…!
description.th: อาชา เปอร์เวซ ลอร์ดแห่งเปอร์เวซ ผู้นำชัยชยะมาสู่สงครามที่กินเวลายาวนานกว่า 28 ปี อาชามุ่งหน้าไปยังพระราชวังเพื่อรับรางวัลแห่งชัยชนะที่จักรพรรดิได้ให้คำมั่นไว้ โดยมีจุดมุ่งหมายเพื่อนำมาบูรณะดินแดนเปอร์เวซ ซึ่งถูกจักรวรรดิทอดทิ้งจากสงครามที่ยืดเยื้อ แต่ทว่า รางวัลเดียวที่อาชาได้รับกลับเป็น <การเลือกคู่แต่งงาน> อาชาตัดสินใจเลือกมกุฎราชกุมาร ดยุกแห่งคาร์ไลล์ ฮาเว่น ผู้ซึ่งถูกปลดจากตำแหน่งมกุฎราชกุมารเมื่อไม่นานมานี้ ถ้าเธอถูกปฏิเสธ เธอก็จะได้รับรางวัลอย่างงามจากจักรพรรดิ แต่ว่า… “มาร์คกราฟแห่งเปอร์เวซ ข้ายอมรับคำขอแต่งงานของเจ้า” ทุกอย่างกลับไม่เป็นไปตามที่คาดไว้ ดยุกแห่งคาร์ไลล์ ฮาเว่นเลือกที่ยอมรับคำขอแต่งงานของอาชา และเขายังสัญญาที่จะให้การสนับสนุนเปอร์เวซอย่างเต็มที่อีกด้วย
description.tr: Perbaz’ın 28 yıl süren savaşı zafere taşıyan lordu ‘Asya Pervaz’. Uzun süren savaşta harap olan Pervaz için Asya, imparator tarafından vaat edilen zafer ödülünü almak üzere imparatorluk ailesine gider. Ancak kendisine geri dönen tek ödül <Evlilik eşi seçme hakkı> olmuştur. Asya en iyi seçenek olarak, yakın zamanda veliaht prens ünvanından mahrum bırakılan ilk prens olan ‘Colail Haven Dükü’nü işaret etti. Eğer reddedilirse, imparatordan nafaka almaya niyetliydi… “Markiz Pervaz. Evlilik teklifinizi kabul ediyorum.” Beklentilerin aksine Colail Dükü, Asya’nın teklifini kabul etti. Pervaz’a büyük destek sözü verdi!..
description.vi: Lãnh địa Pervaz đã bị tàn phá bởi một cuộc chiến tranh. Và vĩ lãnh chúa mới của lãnh địa Pervaz này chính là Asha Pervaz. Cô được hoàng đế ban thưởng cho chiến thắng của mình. Nhưng người gặp cô lại chế giễu cô là ‘nàng công chúa man rợ’ và thật là một đề nghị vô lý khi trao quyền chọn bạn đời làm phần thưởng cho chiến thắng. Asha phải đưa ra lựa chọn tốt nhất ngay cả trong hoàn cảnh này. “Vậy…công tước Carlyle Haven đi” Cô chọn ra đại hoàng tử, người đứng đầu danh sách quý tộc và cách đây không lâu đã gây ra một vụ bê bối lớn và bị tước đoạt danh hiệu đại hoàng tử. Nếu anh ta tức giận và từ chối, cô sẽ nhanh chóng đòi bồi thường sau đó, nhưng đâu ngờ rằng Carlyle lại chấp nhận sự lựa chọn của cô. “Anh mong muốn gì ở tôi?” “Đừng bận tậm đến việc tôi làm ở Pervaz. Đừng mong rằng được đối xử như một người vợ và cũng đừng nghĩ đến việc dính líu đến phe đối lập của tôi. Và khi tôi yêu cầu thì đừng nói linh tinh gì cả, chỉ cần ký vào tờ giấy ly hôn là được” Đó là một giao dịch không có gì là không tốt đối với Asha. Cô nắm lấy tay của kẻ ngạo mạn kia mà ngay cả hoàng đế cũng coi thường. Một nụ cười đầy sức quyến rũ nở trên môi anh. “Phu nhân, sau này xin được giúp đỡ”
description.zh:
事业型男女主被迫联姻，
强强联合收获爱与权力
在长达28年的战争中，佩尔瓦兹的领主“阿西娅·佩尔瓦兹”成功地率领众人取得了胜利。为了重建因长期战争而荒芜的佩尔瓦兹，阿西娅前往皇室领取皇帝承诺的胜仗奖励。但等待她却只是区区<择偶权>，而无任何实质性的奖励。想到佩尔瓦兹的百姓连今年冬天都可能撑不过去，阿西娅只好选择刚失去皇太子身份的卡莱尔公爵作为结婚对象…“既然皇室不想让我们好过，那么就拉你们一起下水”。
description.pt-br: O senhor de Pervaz, que liderou a guerra de 28 anos até a vitória, 'Asha Pervaz'. Para Pervaz, que foi devastado pela longa guerra, Asha dirige-se à família imperial para receber a recompensa da vitória prometida pelo imperador. No entanto, a única recompensa que voltou foi o . Como melhor escolha, Asha apontou o ‘Duque de Carlisle Haven’, o primeiro príncipe que recentemente foi privado do título de príncipe herdeiro. Se ela fosse recusada, ela pretendia receber pensão alimentícia do imperador… “Marquês Pervaz. Aceitarei sua proposta de casamento. Contrariando as expectativas, o duque de Carlisle aceitou a escolha de Asha. Prometendo um tremendo apoio à Pervaz…!
description.zh-hk: 為了拯救因漫長戰爭而荒廢的領地「菲爾巴茲」，亞莎前往皇室向皇帝要求當初所承諾的戰勝補償。然而，她卻只獲得了「結婚對象選擇權」。權衡之下，亞莎認為最好的人選是不久前被剝奪皇太子地位的卡拉爾．海本公爵，假如被拒絕了，就能從皇帝那裡得到精神賠償… 「菲爾巴茲伯爵，我接受妳的求婚。」 出乎意料的是，卡拉爾公爵接受了亞莎的選擇，還承諾提供菲爾巴茲龐大的支援…！

altTitles.th: บุปผารุ่มราคะ

description.en: Na Hae-soo's life unravels when her husband betrays her with an affair, leaving her burdened with debt and losing their child. In a devastating blow, she witnesses him with a younger woman. Broken and despondent, Na Hae-soo feels her life crumbling around her. However, a mysterious young man unexpectedly enters her life, asking to be taught about adult love. His vulnerability and sincerity begin to stir emotions within Na Hae-soo, challenging her to reconsider her path forward.
description.fr: La vie de Na Hae-soo se désintègre lorsque son mari la trahit en ayant une liaison, la laissant accablée de dettes et perdant leur enfant. Dans un coup dévastateur, elle le surprend avec une femme plus jeune. Brisée et désespérée, Na Hae-soo sent sa vie s'effondrer autour d'elle. Cependant, un jeune homme mystérieux entre soudainement dans sa vie, lui demandant de lui enseigner l'amour adulte. Sa vulnérabilité et sa sincérité commencent à éveiller des émotions en Na Hae-soo, l'incitant à reconsidérer son chemin vers l'avenir.
description.id: Kehidupan Na Haesoo berubah ketika suaminya mengkhianatinya dengan berselingkuh, membuatnya terlilit hutang dan kehilangan anak mereka. Setelah itu, ia mendapati suaminya bersama seorang wanita yang lebih muda. Dengan perasaan hancur dan putus asa, Na Haesoo merasa kehidupannya di sekelilingnya runtuh dan hancur. Namun, seorang pemuda misterius tiba-tiba memasuki hidupnya, Beom Taeha, yang meminta untuk diajari tentang cinta orang dewasa. Keluguan dan ketulusannya mulai mengusik emosi dalam diri Na Haesoo, dan menantangnya untuk mempertimbangkan kembali langkah apa yang akan diambil.
description.pl:
Mój mąż miał romans.
Nie wystarczy wziąć na siebie mnóstwo długów, stracić dziecko, na moich oczach zmieszałam się z bardzo młodą kobietą. Zranione życie usychało bez żadnego wyglądu.
"Pokarz mi miłość dorosłego" - podejrzany młodszy mężczyzna, który wtargnął w życie Na Haesoo.
Niebezpieczny i posłuszny, zaczyna potrząsać Na Haesoo.
description.pt-br: A vida de Na Hae-soo se desfaz quando seu marido a trai. Como se não bastasse estar endividada e ter perdido um filho… Em um golpe devastador, ela o flagra fazendo sexo com uma mulher bem mais jovem do que ela. Quebrada e desanimada, Na Hae-soo sente sua vida desmoronando ao seu redor.  No entanto, um jovem misterioso inesperadamente entra em sua vida, pedindo para ser ensinado sobre o amor adulto. Sua vulnerabilidade e sinceridade começam a despertar emoções em Na Hae-soo, desafiando-a a reconsiderar seu caminho a seguir.

description.en:
"It may be hazy blue, but that's alright"

Taking place a year after the epilogue of Seasons of Blossom, this story focuses on the new opening of “Cafe Blossom and NEMONE Atelier” as well as Bomi’s new classmate “Pureum” as they explore a new found youth. 

Campus romance, after school romance, office romance, it has it all.  

The heartwarming series is back with another youthful story!
description.fr:
« Ça peut être d'un bleu brumeux, mais c'est pas grave. »

Se déroulant un an après l'épilogue de "Seasons of Blossom", cette histoire se concentre sur la nouvelle ouverture du « Café Blossom and NEMONE Atelier », ainsi que sur la nouvelle camarade de classe de Bomi, « Pureum », alors qu'ils explorent une nouvelle jeunesse. Romance sur le campus, amours après l'école, romance au bureau, il y a de tout. La série réconfortante revient avec une nouvelle histoire pleine de jeunesse !

altTitles.en: I Thought It's a Common Isekai Story
I Thought It Was a Common Possession

description.en: I was the villainess who would die at the hands of the male lead, but I know this is a cliché! I thought it was a pretty good deal to die unjustly, as a payment for the price I paid for being the villainess. Until I realized that I couldn’t escape from the original plotline. If I was going to die anyway according to the original, then let’s give a kiss to my handsome husband!… Why did the original plot start to change?
description.ko:
그럼 그렇지, 내 팔자에 무슨 주인공이야.

남편 손에 죽을 팔자의 악녀였지만, 난 이 클리셰를 안다!​
억울하게 죽은 대가로는 꽤 괜찮다고 생각했다.
원작의 흐름에서 벗어나지 못한다는 걸 깨닫기 전까지는.
결국 원작대로 죽을 거라면, 초미남 남편에게 뽀뽀라도 해보자!

description.en: Linling, an ordinary high school girl, is actually the daughter of the Scarlet-Haired Witch — an existence akin to a max-level top player! However, she’s being hounded by a handsome and frivolous miscreant prince from another world for an unpaid debt. Thus begins the countdown for an emotional game with debt on the line…

title.en: Zennin Ossan, Umarekawattara SSS Rank Jinsei ga Kakutei Shita

altTitles.en: Your SSS-Rank Afterlife Is Confirmed, Virtuous Old Man
As a virtuous middle-aged man, my new life was confirmed to be SSS rank

altTitles.ja: 善人おっさん、生まれ変わったらSSSランク人生が確定した

altTitles.ko: 착한 아재, 다시 태어나니 SSS랭크 인생이 확정됐다

description.en: The virtuous will definitely be rewarded! This world judges the deeds and good karma of your previous life, and grants you a rank when you are reborn. The benevolent man, even surprising the gods through this, decides to be reborn as the son Alexander of a noble family in the same world as his past life, and thus starts his SSS-Rank life! Follow Alec's journey as he lives his life as a SSS Rank!!

A war-torn world. The prince of Ansaz, Þjálfi the Immortal, continued his march with the strength of a demon god. The country he was aiming for was Arsatual. The princess, Elna, is incapable of using magic. But because of this, she is said to be able to use the sacred sword...
description.vi: Cuộc phiêu lưu của Công chúa Elna từ vương quốc Arthurtual và Hoàng tử Thjalfi từ vương quốc đối địch Ansuz. Tình yêu, phiêu lưu và chiến tranh, một bộ truyện mang đậm phong cách Gibili rất hay mà bạn không nên bỏ qua.

description.en: Hitori Gotou is a high school girl who's starting to learn to play the guitar because she dreams of being in a band, but she's so shy that she hasn't made a single friend. However her dream might come true after she meets Nijika Ijichi, a drummer girl looking for a new guitarist for her band.
description.es: Bocchi The Rock! cuenta la historia de Goto Hitori, una chica de secundaria que empieza a aprender a tocar la guitarra persiguiendo su sueño de formar parte de una banda. Pese a que es muy dedicada, su arrolladora timidez le impide poder conseguir siquiera una amiga. Pero cuando conozca a Ijichi Nijika, una baterista que está buscando una nueva guitarrista para su grupo, Goto dará el primer paso para cumplir su gran sueño página a página, tira a tira.
description.it:
Hitori Goto è una liceale che inizia a imparare a suonare la chitarra perchè il suo sogno è di entrare a far parte di una band, 
ma è talmente timida da non avere nemmeno un amico. 
Ma il suo sogno potrebbe avverarsi in seguito all'incontro con Nijika Ijichi, una ragazza che suona la batteria 
ed è alla ricerca proprio di un chitarrista per la band in cui suona.
description.ja: 「ぼっちちゃん」こと後藤ひとりは、ギターを愛する孤独な少女。家で一人寂しく弾くだけの毎日でしたが、ひょんなことから伊地知虹夏が率いる「結束バンド」に加入することに。人前での演奏に不慣れな後藤は、立派なバンドマンになれるのか――！？全国のぼっちな少年少女に届ける、いま最高にアツい音楽漫画！！陰キャならロックをやれ！！！
description.pt-br:
Hitori Gotou é uma colegial que está começando a aprender a tocar violão porque sonha em fazer parte de uma banda, mas é tão tímida que não fez um único amigo. No entanto, seu sonho pode se tornar realidade depois que ela conhece Nijika Ijichi, uma garota que toca bateria e está procurando um novo guitarrista para sua banda.

[ 1° TEMP.  DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 2, Cap 21. ]

description.en: Annette Rosenberg, a descendant of the Padanian royal family and the only daughter of a military captain. After two years of dating, she married her father’s faithful servant, Heiner Valdemar. Everything was perfect. Until her family fell due to her husband’s betrayal. “You will be unhappy by my side for the rest of your life.” Annette suddenly realized something. This man’s revenge is just beginning.

altTitles.en: Kissing You Before Going To Bed

description.en: Jiho gains psychic powers from a childhood accident! However, she can't control them! Enduring pain for 18 years with this troublesome ability, Jiho discovers that physical contact with the guy next door, Yechan, can temporarily free her from her psychic woes... To engage in legal physical contact, Jiho must seduce Yechan in this spontaneous and hilarious romantic fantasy hero action with a touch of superpower chaos!

title.en: I Can't Get Enough of You

altTitles.en: I Can’t Wait To Eat You

description.en: Outstanding talent. A look that won't be overlooked no matter where you are. A prosperous family. I lived by walking only on well-paved paths. Everything was so perfect to the point that it was boring. Then one day when I turned 30... Taejun Kim impulsively deviates from the path. To meet ‘Han So-eun’, the daughter of the driver who took his parents’ lives. 'With what kind of face did you come to this company?' The shameless face was disgusting. So he decided to stick around and torment her. Like a person who is impatient because he can't eat... “I think the director likes..."
description.fr:
Des capacités exceptionnelles. Une belle apparence qui ne passera pas inaperçue. Une famille aisée. Une vie sur un chemin bien tracé. Tout était ennuyeux et parfait. Jusqu'au jour où, à trente ans, Kim Tae-joon quitte impulsivement la route.
Rencontrer Han So-eun, la fille du chauffeur qui a coûté la vie à ses parents.
« Comment diable êtes-vous entré dans cette entreprise en tant qu'étranger ?
J'étais dégoûté par son impudeur, alors j'ai décidé de la garder et de la tourmenter. Comme quelqu'un qui n'en a jamais assez de toi....
"Je pense que j'aime le réalisateur."
Oh non.

description.en:
"How about a kiss for a wish?"
Seo Do-ya, a demon, had a strange dream one day and on the same day he met Sowon, a new student at school.
Why does my body react even if I just glance slightly at Sowon!?
Meanwhile, Sowon attended the new student's welcome party and met the popular actor Woo-Jae Hyeong.
Between Woo-Jae Hyeong and Seo Do-ya,who will Sowon choose?
A thrilling, dizzying, complicated and messy campus love life begins.

Scrap the boring, run-of-the-mill dating show! Lovers gather together to test the strength of their love. One lover seeks revenge on their swapped lover, one couple seeks fame and another seeks to test their love.
Spicy lover’s revenge set in an ultra-popular hit dating entertainment show!

altTitles.es-la: Complejo De Amigos De La Infancia

description.en: Ha-neul and Mincheol have been childhood friends for all of their lives, but their relationship takes on a whole new dynamic when they undergo a series of unexpected events. Although they vowed that they'd never be romantically attracted to each other, they just might be proven wrong... especially when things start to escalate and neither can predict where they'll end up.
description.ko: 20살에 20년지기, 평생을 함께한 소꿉친구 하늘과 민철. 그런 소꿉친구의 알고 싶지 않은 은밀..

description.en: A new series from the creator of *Rosario+Vampire* with artwork that's beyond this dimension! Chloé dreams of being an actress, but her path to success may be closed as she's now twenty-eight with very little to show for it. However, she does happen to have a special occult body type!
description.ja: 女優を夢見て生きるも花開かずアラサーになってしまったクロエは、類い稀なるオカルト体質の持ち主だった。ある時、退魔請負人（ゴーストリーパー）を名乗る青年・カイと出会ったことをきっかけに黄泉を脱獄し現世へ舞い戻った悪霊たちを退治することになって…!?
description.ru:
Новая работа от автора «Rosario + Vampire».  
Хлоя с детства мечтала стать актрисой, но отсутствие таланта всё время вставляло ей палки в колёса. Время шло, ей уже 28, за спиной одни провальные работы, надежды на какой-либо успех всё ниже и ниже. И вот, попытав счастье на очередном собеседовании, её жизнь приобретает новые краски: судьбоносная встреча, что случилась в тот день, меняет всю её жизнь и приоткрывает завесу над потусторонним.

title.en: The Villainess Captured the Grand Duke

altTitles.es-la: Capturé el corazón del gran duque siendo una villana

description.en:
In this novel, my favorite character died.
After being rejected by the female lead and losing his emotions, he could no longer use his abilities,
and as he became weak, the North collapsed.
Even his body was never to be found,
but the novel only depicted the happy ending of the protagonists.

And I possessed the body of the villainess "Schuer" from that novel.

"Rather, I'll make him regain his emotions before he meets the female lead."

Thus, I left for the North.

"Grand Duke, can you hold my hand just once?
Or maybe a signature. I'll keep it as a heirloom."
"If you want my signature, you too should sign and stamp here, my Lady."
"What's this?"
"A marriage certificate."

Huh?

"You can just act you usually do.
It seems like your behavior is
is somewhat getting on my nerves."

...Did I win the jackpot?

“Why do you keep asking if we’re dating? We’re just holding hands, we’re not dating!!”
It’s a slice-of-life romantic comedy about couples who aren’t really couples!
description.id:
Sebuah karya baru dari author Webtoon Character Na Kang Lim

“Kenapa kamu terus tanya kalau kita pacaran? Kita cuma bergandengan tangan, kita nggak pacaran!!”

description.en: Ha Maru, a butcher working at a livestock company, is invited by his supervisor to go on a business trip to Japan. However, he soon discovers that the place he has been sent to is a criminal organization run by the Yakuza. In order to survive in this dangerous environment, Ha Maru struggles and gradually awakens his hidden talent for using knives. The butcher, who has now set foot in the underworld, challenges the pinnacle of the criminal world to stay alive.

altTitles.pt-br: As Regras De Um Bom Garoto

description.en:
Dead Mansion, a Russian private orphanage, trains children to become agents.

The legend of Dead Mansion, codename Sean, which was thought to have been lost due to a "shipping error", has appeared in Korea...?
description.ko:
어린아이들을 요원으로 양성하는 러시아 사설 보육원 '데드멘션'.

그리고 오배송으로 잃어버린 줄 알았던 데드멘션의 전설 '코드네임.
description.pt-br: Um orfanato particular na Rússia chamado “Mansão da Morte” treina crianças pequenas para se tornarem agentes. Essa é uma história que se passa no mesmo universo de Lookism.

description.en:
Sada is a modern-day witch who is tired of living quietly deep in the mountains. In fact, she wants more attention! Why can't witches be known by humans?!　

This is a story of modern “witches” who break the curse and live freely and uninhibitedly!

The manga follows "another Alice," a female high school student who curses her everyday life. When by chance she loses her way on the "Border road", she is forced into in a deadly battle for survival.

Steve is a builder that just wants to mine materials and craft in peace, but the mysterious monster girls that surround him wont leave him in peace!

---

**Note:** This is the webtoon version of [Minecraft - Anime Edition](https://mangadex.org/title/ad547db3-2e92-4f9b-b386-70c9f88fc0c1)
A gay sorceror and a seductive priestess cross paths in an Online RPG.
description.fr: Suivez les aventures d'un sorcier gay et d'une jolie prêtresse en plein cœur d'un RPG.
description.ro: Un vrajitor homosexual si o preoteasa seductiva se intalnesc din intamplare intr-un online RPG
description.pt-br: Um feiticeiro homossexual e uma sacerdotisa sedutora se cruzam em um RPG online.

altTitles.ja: がんばっていきまっしょい

title.en: Walking with Death: Start From Murloc Dungeons

altTitles.zh: 与死亡同行：从鱼人地下城开始

description.en: After unlocking the hidden job "Death Walker", it is only natural for me to become a legendary adventurer... right?

“I was given a building as an inheritance?”

From a nobody who does all kinds of odd jobs and lived a hard life, he was given a chance to become a landlord right in the middle of Gangnam!

But, the condition for this inheritance is to ‘operate a restaurant for 5 years.’

‘Moreover, I can sense a chill down my spine thanks to the weird customers that came in for today’s store opening……Do I really just need to prepare food?’

“So then…all the guests who came in yesterday…”

“They were ghosts.”

Every night starting from 11 o’ clock until 1 o’clock, we will now be open!

altTitles.ru: Младший сын семьи Пэн из Хэбэя

description.en:
Habuk Peng Family’s best strength, Peng Jihyuk heads to the Nakho Region to save his family that fell into destruction due to the attack of the Demon Sect, but everything was a trap. At the moment of death, he felt the wrath of being the only one left from his beloved family.

‘Again…if you give me a chance…!”

Peng Jihyuk, who thought he was dead, woke up in the body of Young Master Sa, of the Peng Family.

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/pengjiasigongzi/list?title_no=2059)
description.ko:
하북팽가 최고의 전력, 도왕 팽지혁. 마교의 습격으로 멸문지화에 빠진 가문을 구하러 낙호곡으로 향하지만 모든 것은 함정이었고, 죽음의 순간 자신이 사랑했던 가문에게 버림받았다는 사실에 분노한다.
'다시... 내게 한 번만 더 기회가 주어진다면...!'
죽은 줄 알았던 팽지혁은 방구석 둔재, 하북팽가 사공자의 몸에서 눈을 뜬다.

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/pengjiasigongzi/list?title_no=2059)
description.ru:
Пэн Джи Хёк — лучший воин семейства Пэн из Хэбэя. Из-за атаки Магё его семейство почти исчезло... Для её спасения он отправляется в дальнее путешествие, во время которого попадает в ловушку. За мгновение до смерти он узнал, что его горячо любимая семья от него отказалась, и пришёл в ярость.
«Если бы у меня был ещё один шанс!..»
Он уже был готов к встрече со смертью, но когда открыл глаза — оказался в теле молодого господина.

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/pengjiasigongzi/list?title_no=2059)
description.zh:
一代刀王重生废柴四公子！
为报恩逆袭勇斗魔教！
名门彭家的最强战斗力，刀王彭枝奕。为了拯救因魔教的袭击而陷入灭门之灾的彭家，彭枝奕前往落虎谷与魔教教主决战，却发现这一切都是个陷阱。临死之前得知自己被深爱的家族抛弃的彭枝奕愤怒不已。彭枝奕原以为自己死了，没想到却在彭家四公子的身体里重新醒了过来。

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/pengjiasigongzi/list?title_no=2059)

description.en:
A weak and sickly boy, Sung Woo-mun's condition worsens when he loses his mental capacities, owing to a painting gifted by a sage. He grows up as the 'village idiot', pitied by his own parents. But unbeknownst to everyone, his life is about to change soon, and a new destiny awaits him. When Sung Woo-mun turns 20, not only does he have an epiphany, but an undefeatable martial arts power begins to bloom inside the painting. What could all of this mean for Woo Mun? And what strange world awaits him?

---

**Links:**
- [Alternative Raw (Kakao Webtoon)](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%B6%88%ED%8C%A8%EA%B2%80%EC%84%A0/1985)
- [Official Japanese Translation (Piccoma)](https://piccoma.com/web/product/47151)
description.ja: 旅籠屋の長男に生まれた「宋愚問」 「愚問」は体が弱い兄と違って、弟の「愚強」だけ華山派に入門してすることになった。 二人の初年の運命が枝分かれしたあの日…仙人が飲食代の代わりに山水画を描いてくれた後、山水画に酔いしれ続けた「愚問」は健康を取り戻したが、バカになってしまった。 二十歳になった日！ 「愚問」知らないうちに無限の武功を身につくようになったがーー
description.ko:
시골 객점의 아들 송우문.
어릴 적부터 몸이 약했던 그는
어느 날 노도사가 그려 주고 간
산수화를 보고 바보가 된다.

그렇게 동네에선 바보라 놀림받고
부모에겐 한심한 아들로 자라지만

스무 살이 되던 날!
각성과 함께 산수화 속 절대무공을 꽃피운다!
description.ru: Сон Вумун, сын деревенщины, с самого рождения был слабым. Однажды, увидев как художник рисовал пейзаж, он потерял рассудок. Каждый в деревне издевался над его глупостью. Но вот ему исполнилось двадцать и он станет настоящим мастером боевых искусств!

altTitles.en: The Story Of The Reincarnation Of The Tiger

description.en:
San-gun, the owner of the mountain, was reborn as a tiger and became a spiritual creature. A girl visits San-gun, who lived in peace, and says she will serve him. San-gun tries to drive her out, but she has nowhere to go back. San-gun finally decided to take back the girl. And there are countless threats to him…

---

- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%82%AD%EC%84%A0%EA%B8%B0%ED%99%98%EB%8B%B4/2496)

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc30480)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/77920)
description.ja:
風のように、雲のように暮らす神仙を私たちは浪仙と呼ぶ。 ひょんなことから主人公は読んでいた小説のなかの虎・山君に憑依した。 虎の体で霊物として羽化登仙（うかとうせん）していく、つまり神仙になることを決意。 白山の山君として悠々自適な生活をしていたとき、人間からの生贄として初亜という少女を捧げられる。 彼女を追い出そうとするが、彼女には行き場がない。 結局少女をそばに置いておく決心した山君だったが、そんな彼に幾多の脅威が迫ってくる･･･

---

- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%82%AD%EC%84%A0%EA%B8%B0%ED%99%98%EB%8B%B4/2496)

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc30480)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/77920)
description.ko:
호랑이로 환생하여, 영물이 되어 살아가던 산의 주인 산군.
평화롭게 살아가던 산군의 앞에 한 소녀가 찾아오게 된다. 
대뜸 지아비로 모시겠다고 하는 소녀. 귀찮은 산군은 그녀를 내쫓으려고 하지만, 그녀는 돌아갈 곳이 없다.
결국 소녀를 거두기로 결심한 산군. 그런 그에게 수많은 위협이 닥쳐오게 되는데….

---

- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%82%AD%EC%84%A0%EA%B8%B0%ED%99%98%EB%8B%B4/2496)

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc30480)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/77920)
description.ru:
Переродившись в тигра из романа, он жил как дух охраняющий гору Бэк. И в одну прекрасную безмятежную ночь в его жизнь ворвалась девочка. Без объяснений она начала утверждать, что теперь является его невестой. Он не раз попытался прогнать её прочь, но ей некуда было возвращаться. Так он решил оставить девочку у себя. Но он даже не представлял к каким опасностям он себя подвергает…

---

- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%82%AD%EC%84%A0%EA%B8%B0%ED%99%98%EB%8B%B4/2496)

description.zh:
转世成为一只有灵力的老虎，并成为山之主的山君，而少女楚儿的到来打乱了它平静的生活。楚儿表示将作为他的夫人服侍他，山君却不耐烦地要赶走她。然而楚儿无处可去，最终山君决定收留楚儿，殊不知危险接踵而至……

title.en: Touch My Little Brother and You're Dead

altTitles.ko-ro: Nae Dongsaeng Geondeulmyeon Neohuineun Da Jugeun Moksumida

altTitles.en: If You Lay a Hand on My Brother, You're All Dead
If You Touch My Little Brother, You're All Dead

altTitles.ru: Только троньте моего братика – всем вам конец

altTitles.uk: Тільки торкніться мого братика і всім вам кінець!

description.de:
Kim Si-Seub wacht eines Tages auf und stellt fest, dass sie sich in der Boys' Love Geschichte „Asterion der Abenddämmerung“ befindet. Ab sofort ist sie niemand Geringeres als Rosalite, die ältere Schwester des Hauptcharakters Asterion, und ihr steht eine Menge Drama bevor. Laut der Originalgeschichte ist es Asterions Schicksal, mit 18 Jahren zu sterben, doch Rosalite hat es sich zum Ziel gesetzt, den Lauf der Dinge zu ändern. Sie gibt ihr Bestes, um ihren kleinen Bruder zu retten, aber er stirbt immer und immer wieder – und jedes Mal, wenn Asterion stirbt, erwacht Rosalite erneut in ihrem 16-jährigen Körper. Trotzdem bleibt sie weiterhin fest entschlossen, sein Schicksal zu ändern und ihn vor wahnsinnigen Verehrern zu beschützen. Wird es ihr gelingen, die Geschichte umzuschreiben und das Leben ihres Bruders zu retten?

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%82%B4-%EB%8F%99%EC%83%9D-%EA%B1%B4%EB%93%A4%EB%A9%B4-%EB%84%88%ED%9D%AC%EB%8A%94-%EB%8B%A4-%EC%A3%BD%EC%9D%80-%EB%AA%A9%EC%88%A8%EC%9D%B4%EB%8B%A4/2568), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/57361675)

description.en: One day, she woke up from bed and opened her eyes to realise she has transmigrated into the BL novel *Asterion's Starry Blue Night*. The protagonist of a crazy story who killed himself on the verge of death. I've become that protagonist's older sister... Rosalite! The issue is that if and when my brother, Asterion, dies, the system will automatically revert me back to the sixteen-year-old Rosalite! That is why I must protect my brother from a plethora of other assholes in order to avert infinite regression! Whether it's from a son of wealthy household, a prince of the country, or even the imperial prince from across the sea, no matter whoever it is.
description.fr:
Un jour je me suis réveillée dans un roman, et je suis devenue Rosalite, la grande sœur d'Astérion, le héros. Je ne suis peut-être pas le personnage principal mais ce n'est pas très grave... Non, mon problème c'est que le petit frère de Rosalite est destiné à mourir à l'âge de 18 ans, ce qui est assez triste vu tout ce qu'il a dû traverser (je vous ai dit que ce roman était un BL au fait?). J'ai donc décidé de le sauver mais... peu importe les efforts que je fais, il ne cesse de mourir, et à chaque fois qu'il meurt, je retourne dans le passé, au moment où j'ai atterri dans ce fichu bouquin. Mais je n'ai pas dit mon dernier mot. Qu'ils soient beaux, riches, sexy, peu importe, le premier qui approche mon petit frère... il signe son arrêt de mort.

---

description.uk:
Я стала шістнадцятирічною Розалітою. Впавши з ліжка, і відкривши очі, я зрозуміла, що я в класичній, безглуздій, шаленій, але втомлюючій BL новелі "Астеріон блакитної зоряної ночі". Із всіх можливих варіантів, я стала старшою сестрою главного героя Астеріона, якому судилося закінчити життя самогубством. Я вирішила просто плити за течею історії і доплисти до фіналу, але варто було цьому статися, і мене знов повернули в тіло Розаліти. Оскільки минуле рішення було неправильне,другого разу, я вирішила виховувати братика в любові, але і на цей раз він загинув, хоча і не по свої волі. А я знов повернулась до початку. Тоді, я вирішила спробувати зовсім іншу тактику – сфокусуватись не на рятунку братика, а на самій собі. Але, і це не допомогло. Я ісекайнулася, саме тоді, коли вивчила, як користуватися магією і написала наукову дисертацію. А раз я постійно повертаюся в тіло Розаліти Роксбог, тоді обов'язково треба спробувати знайти спосіб для власної, красивої смерті.

我竟然穿越到了纯爱小说《蓝色夜空中的亚迪里恩》的配角——亚迪里恩的姐姐罗泽丽特的身上？要命的是只要弟弟里恩一死，我就会重生回16岁，为了结束这无限的轮回，只能用尽办法从各路渣男手中守护我的弟弟！

description.en:
Yuusuke, a 7th grader, is interested in his friend's older sister for various reasons.
The older sister, while a little strange, is a kind and caring girl.
She's mysterious but is popular with everyone.  
This is an ordinary comedy about Mayuri-san's mysterious everyday life.

title.en: Tensei Kizoku, Kantei Skill de Nariagaru ~Jakushou Ryouchi o Uketsuida node, Yuushuu na Jinzai o Fuyashiteitara, Saikyou Ryouchi ni Natteta~

altTitles.ja: 転生貴族、鑑定スキルで成り上がる～弱小領地を受け継いだので、優秀な人材を増やしていたら、最強領地になってた～

altTitles.ja-ro: Tensei Kizoku Kantei Skill de Nariagaru ~Jakushou Ryouchi wo Uketsuidanode, Yuushuuna Jinzai wo Fuyashite Itara, Saikyou Ryouchi ni Natteta~

altTitles.en: As a Reincarnated Aristocrat, I'll Use My Appraisal Skill to Rise in the World: I Inherited a Weak Territory, and If I Increase the Number of Capable Personnel, It Will Become the Strongest Territory

altTitles.zh-hk: 轉生貴族，以鑑定技能成名～因為繼承了弱小的領地，所以如果增加了優秀的人才，就會成為最強的領地～

altTitles.id: Terlahir kembali menjadi seorang bangsawan dengan skill penilaian
Seorang bangsawan yang bereinkarnasi, bangkit dengan kemampuan analisis

altTitles.pt-br: Como um Aristocrata Reencarnado, Usarei Minha Habilidade de Avaliação para Subir no Mundo

altTitles.vi: Quý Tộc Tái Sinh Thăng Tiến Nhờ Kỹ Năng Thẩm Định: Vì Thừa Kế Một Lãnh Địa Nhỏ Yếu, Nên Khi Tuyển Dụng Người Tài, Đã Trở Thành Lãnh Địa Mạnh Nhất
Tái Sinh Thành Quý Tộc Với Kĩ Năng "Thẩm Định"

description.en: After being reincarnated, Ars Louvent is supposed to live in a different world as a weak aristocrat. Both his physical strength and intelligence were mediocre in both worlds, but here he naturally possessed a skill called "Appraisal" that allowed him to see the potential of any person. By gathering talented people by his side, Ars uses this "Appraisal" skill to transform his weak territory into the strongest one! But the road ahead of him won't be so simple.
description.ja: 転生し、弱小貴族として異世界を生きることになったアルス・ローベント。現代同様、異世界でも体力・知力ともに平凡だったが、“鑑定スキル”という人の潜在能力を知ることが出来るスキルを生まれつき所持していた。アルスは自分の民たちを守るため、“鑑定スキル”で弱小領地を最強の領地へと変貌させていく───！
description.vi: Sau khi được tái sinh, Ars Louvent được cho là một quý tộc yếu kém. Cả sức mạnh thể chất và trí tuệ của cậu đều ở mức trung bình ở cả 2 thế giới. Nhưng cậu sở hữu một kĩ năng độc nhất có tên ' Thẩm định' cho phép cậu có thể nhìn được chỉ số và tiềm năng của mọi người. Bằng cách tập hợp những người tài năng về bên cạnh, Ars sẽ sử dụng kĩ năng 'Thẩm định' này để khiến lãnh thổ yếu ớt của mình thành nơi mạnh nhất! Nhưng con đường phía trước của cậu sẽ không hề dễ dàng.
description.pt-br: Após ser reencarnado, Ars Louvent deve viver em um mundo diferente como um aristocrata fraco. Tanto sua força física quanto sua inteligência eram medíocres em ambos os mundos, mas aqui ele naturalmente possuía uma habilidade chamada “Avaliação” que lhe permitia ver o potencial de qualquer pessoa. Ao reunir pessoas talentosas ao seu lado, Ars usa esta habilidade de “Avaliação” para transformar seu território fraco no mais forte! Mas o caminho à sua frente não será tão simples.

description.ar: تسو تيانشين هو آخر إنسان حي في مدينة مليئة بالزومبي. فقط عندما كان متأكداً من أنه مات ، يجد روحه تعود إلى ما قبل ذلك اليوم المشؤوم قبل عشر سنوات. يقسم أنه سوف يحمي الناس المهمين له هذه المرة ويجتمع مع عشيقته. تابعوا نضاله من أجل البقاء بمساعدة ذكرياته للسنوات العشر القادمة!
description.en: Zuo Tianchen is the last living human in a mutated zombie-infested city. Just when he was sure he'd died, he finds his soul returned to just before that ill-fated day ten years ago. He swears he'll protect the people important to him this time round and reunite with his past lover. Watch his struggles to survive equipped with his memory of the next ten years!
description.fr: uo Tianchen est l'un des derniers survivants sur terre depuis qu'une épidémie venant de l'espace s'était abattue sur terre, il l'y a de cela 10 ans. Alors qu'il est sur le point de mourir, Zuo fît donc ses adieux à sa petite amie qu'il avait rencontré durant l'épidémie. C'est alors que, d'un coup, alors qu'il était sur le point de mourir, il retourna dans le temps 10 ans auparavant, quelques heures avant le début de l'épidémie. C'est alors qu'il décida de sauver son meilleur ami qui avait périt dès le début de l'épidémie, 10 ans auparavant, et c'est alors qu'il se met à la recherche de sa copine qu'il avait dans l'ancienne apocalypse.
description.ru:
Зе Тянчен – последний выживший человек в городе, зараженном зомби-инфекцией. Будучи на грани смерти, он внезапно оказался в своем теле десять лет назад, когда город еще не был заражен. Он решил, что в этот раз спасет близких ему людей и воссоединится со своей старой любовью.   
  
Следите за его приключениями, в которых он использует свои воспоминания о следующих 10 годах, чтобы выжить и спасти своих близких!

description.en: Yilin bumps into the tomboy Rouxi, sparking an interest between each other that slowly blooms.
description.pt-br: Yilin esbarra na tomboy Rouxi, despertando um interesse entre elas que floresce lentamente.

altTitles.ja: ちえりの恋は8メートル

altTitles.pt-br: O amor de Chieri tem 8 metros

description.en: An ordinary high school student, Yumeji Kotaki, is transferred to his class by his childhood friend, Chieri Omine, who has grown to 8 meters in height! Yumeji is assigned as "caretaker" to support Chieri's school life. Their daily life is full of excitement due to the height difference! The height difference is nothing to worry about!
description.ja: 普通の高校生・小滝夢路のクラスに転校してきたのは、身長が8メートルに巨大化した幼馴染・大峰ちえりだった！ちえりの学校生活のサポートをする「お手伝いさん」を任された夢路。身長差がある二人の日常はドキドキがいっぱいで!?　高低差もなんのその！
description.pt-br:
Uma aluna transferida que tem 8 metros de altura...?! 
Amigos de infância se reencontram, mas nem tudo é como antes… Uma mudança na relação entre Chieri e Yumeji, acompanhe o desenrolar desta comédia romântica gigantesca.

title.en: Fushi no Gunzei wo Hikiiru Bocchi Shiryoujutsushi, Tenshoku shite SSS-Rank Boukensha ni naru.

altTitles.en: The Solo Necromancer Leading an Immortal Army Transfers to become an SSS-Rank Adventurer

altTitles.ja: 不死の軍勢を率いるぼっち死霊術師、転職してSSSランク冒険者になる。

description.en:
_“The ultimate ambition of the most formidable necromancer… is to make friends?!”_

In the eleventh hour of the Saldia Empire’s impending defeat, salvation arrives in the form of Rogue, a lone necromancer. Armed with immense power and leading legendary aides, his solitary goal is to forge friendships. Employing the abilities of Kalfa, the most distinguished appraiser, he masks his loathed profession as that of an ‘adventurer.’ Rogue steps into the world as a rookie adventurer, but his extraordinary power can’t be completely hidden, sparking rumors that gradually trigger a grand disturbance in the kingdom. 

Embark on a fresh adventure with this lone necromancer! A long-awaited manga adaptation of a highly popular original work from Syosetu!

title.en: Shoukoku no Altair Gaiden - Toukoku no Subaru

altTitles.en: The Pleiades of the Island Nation

altTitles.ja: 将国のアルタイル嵬伝 嶌国のスバル

altTitles.vi: Sao Thất Nữ nơi Đảo quốc

description.en: The curtain rises on an Oriental Reconquista spin-off of Kato Kotono's "Shoukoku no Altair", set far to the east of Rumeliana is the once peaceful and beautiful island nation of Kusanagi, which has been annexed by the larger country of Cinili and fallen into ruin.

After 20 grueling years of hellish training, Juhyuk's stats are maxed-out, and he is ready to venture out into Olympus, a virtual reality game. 

His master's last dying wish is for Juhyuk to be the Ultimate Evil, the most powerful in Olympus. But when he steps out of the tutorial area, every player tries to kill him, and the game forces him to start over from Level 1! 

With these setbacks, Juhyuk will need all the help he can get to complete his SSS-rank quest and become the next Ultimate Evil.

title.en: The Life of a Returning Officer

description.en:
Choi Jong-hyuk, captain of the intellectual crime unit, loses his mother and his own life to a mysterious mastermind for digging too deeply into a case. In his last moments, Jong-hyuk catches a glimpse of the man who kills him before waking up as his 17-year-old self.

 To prevent his mother's death, Jong-hyuk swears to hunt down the one responsible. Luckily, he has knowledge about the future and his experience as an officer.

Will these tools be enough to catch the criminal that eluded him once?
description.id: Cerita tentang Choi Jong-hyuk, ketua tim intelejen investigasi kejahatan, ketika dia ingin menemui jenazah ibunya, ia mengalami kecelakaan misterius lalu entah bagaimana dia kembali ke tahun tahun 1997.

altTitles.ja-ro: Wakaba San Chi no Aoi Koi

altTitles.vi: Tình Yêu Màu Lam Nhà Wakaba

description.en: Youth romcom about 4 sisters who are all experiencing their first love at the same time. While the eldest is having a crush on the guy at her part-time work, the other three are dealing with their first romantic experiences with boys in their classes and school clubs. Every night, the four have heart-to-heart girls talks as they navigate their respective first loves.
description.ja: 若葉家四姉妹は今、全員が“初恋”の真っ最中。 長女・心春（こはる）はバイト先の先輩、 次女・真夏（まなつ）は趣味が一緒の弓道部の子、 三女・秋楽（あきら）は同じ部活の同級生、 四女・千冬は同じクラスの男子、 それぞれ好きな人に「好き」って気持ちをどう伝えようか 仲の良い四姉妹は日夜、恋のお悩み相談を繰り広げています。 四姉妹それぞれの片想いを見守る “初恋”観察ラブコメディー、開幕！ ◆作者コメント 初連載です！　がんばります！！
description.vi:
Dưới mái nhà kia, có đến bốn trái tim đang loạn nhịp!

Nhà Wakaba có bốn chị em, ai nấy đều đang tuổi xuân căng mọng, xinh đẹp vô bờ.
Và tất nhiên rồi, cái tuổi học sinh sinh viên mới nhú mà, dĩ nhiên phải có gia vị tình yêu quyện vào nó mới trọn vẹn được. Chị cả thì phải lòng tiền bối ở chỗ làm thêm, chị hai, ba và cô em út thì đang phải lòng bạn cùng trường. Và rồi cứ mỗi đêm, cả nhà lại ngồi quây quần với nhau, tâm sự chuyện yêu đương đàn đúm đủ kiểu. Liệu cặp nào sẽ bùng nổ trước đây ta?

Còn nội dung sâu xa thể nào ấy hả? Vào đọc đi rồi biết, hứa không uổng thì giờ hảo ngọt của bạn đâu!

title.en: The Heavenly Demon Will Give You a Massage

altTitles.en: The Heavenly Demon Is Giving a Massage

description.en: Heaven-bound Heavenly Demon, once known as Kang Taehan, Returns to his original life after 60 years! "Ah, in such a blessed era, to be in this shape!" "Your body is screaming to be saved, haven't you heard?" The project to physically and mentally rejuvenate everyone, The journey of the Heavenly Demon Kang Taehan begins!! Weary office workers tired from alcohol and overtime, Athletes whose bodies are ruined and performance declined, Heads of families crushed by the weight of life, Modern people who have accumulated fat to withstand life’s burdens. All you modern people who are weary of their life, come and get a massage!

Some children are raised in the hands of Kwak No, After establishing a Disciple-Master relationship, the children dream of their own dreams by practicing martial arts and walking in that path to become masters. In order to make a living, Kwak No always had to leave his seat, and Seon-yu, the eldest of the children, has to take care of the Children, and He’ll be the Great Master.
description.ko:
삼류 낭인 곽노의 손에 거둬진 아이들.

사제관계를 맺고 아이들은 어설프게나마
무공과 보법 수련을 하며 각자의 꿈을 꾼다.

먹고살기 위해 곽노는 늘 자리를 비워야 했고,
아이들 중 맏이인 선유는 사제들을 돌봐야 한다.

그는 대사형大師兄이다.

title.en: The Game That I Came From

altTitles.ja: ふりだしから始まる覚醒者

description.en:
With the rise of a popular RPG called Tianyong Game, its max-level players called "awakeners" have come to dominate the real world in terms of wealth and power. 

Despite Ling Ce's natural talent for the game, it's nearly impossible for him to catch up to these players because he started playing the game a year after its release. But as luck would have it, a glitch in the game's teleportation system takes him back three years into the past with his memories intact.

Now, Ling Ce is determined to utilize his knowledge and experiences to become an awakener and turn his life around. No amount of carnivorous plant monsters or insanity level dungeons will stop the determined hero from reaching the peak!


---

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/88411)

description.zh: 带着上一世满级盗贼的记忆，回到三年前，这是命运给凌策的考验还是赏赐？ 既然重生，那上一世未曾达到的、不能守护的、那些只能幻想的，这一世全都要。 更以巅峰造极之态，摧枯拉朽之势，超越极限，成为最强“觉醒者”。

altTitles.en: The Demon Lord Levels Up With Martial Arts

description.en:
Now that the demonic realm and the heavenly realm have called a truce, the human world has returned to an era of peace.

Jeon Minchul lives the life of an ordinary college student until the day he comes across an artifact from the war and remembers — in his past life, he was the demon king who brought the world to its knees.

Upon recalling these memories, Minchul awakens his old powers, along with some new ones. But can this demon king harness the powers of both good and evil to protect the peace?
description.ko:
“마왕.”

그건.
인간이 되기 전, 전생의 나를 부르던 말이었다.

description.en:
300 years ago, the invincible warrior Hyeon-oh Kim brought down the Tower of the End, preventing the world’s demise. Though he should have died the moment the Tower of the End collapsed, Hyeon-oh is reborn 300 years later in the body of a 17-year-old boy named Juhyeok Kim.

Meanwhile, he discovers the existence of the Constellations, who were once his disciples 300 years ago but were born during the time when he did not exist in this world. Will he be able to find them again and train them?

Soul Land 2 - The Peerless Tang Sect

Soul Land II - The Unrivaled Tang Sect
Soul Land 2 - The Unrivaled Tang Sect

description.en:
A land without magic, dou-qi, martial arts, but with essence spirits instead. This is the continent 10,000 years after the formation of the Tang Sect. A new hero and his friend walk the land, a new "Seven Monsters of Shriek." Will they keep up the name of the Tang Sect? Or will it crumble due to a new essence system?  

---

**Notes:**
- This is Soul Land's sequel, but you don't have to read it before reading this. There might be spoilers though.
- Starting at chapter 181, the manhua format changes to long strip.

Tang San was a talented apprentice to the great Tang Sect. Due to mastering the forbidden Tang arts, he was pressured to jump off a cliff and died. However, he was reborn into another world filled with Essence Spirits. At the age of six, every person will have their essence spirit awoken. Spirits can take many forms: weapons, plants, and animals; They can help people with their daily lives. Outstanding spirits can be trained to engage in combat. A spirit master is the soul and heart of the Combat Continent! When Tang San turns six, a huge surprise awaits him. His peaceful life in this new world will change completely.

Note: After the original chapter 344, it continued on from a re-written 322.
